title: PermissionEX权限问题
txt_content:
如题！
本人使用spigot的服务端
1.11.2
配置文件具体如下：
groups:
  default:
    permissions:
    - chestcommands.open.vipcd.yml
    - chestcommands.item.vipcd.yml
    - chestcommands.open.ghcd.yml
    - chestcommands.item.ghcd.yml
    - chestcommands.item.zcd.yml
    - chestcommands.open.zcd.yml
    - essentials.builder
    - essentials.build
    - essentials.default
    - moretp.gui
    - moretp.rtp
    - moretp.warp.*
    - moretp.warp
    - moretp.tpno
    - moretp.tpdeny
    - moretp.tpyes
    - moretp.tpaccept
    - moretp.tpahere
    - moretp.tpa
    - cmarry.use.*
    - Chestcommand.item.ghcd.yml
    - Chestcommand.open.ghcd.yml
    - Chestcommand.open.vipcd.yml
    - Chestcommand.item.vipcd.yml
    - Chestcommand.item.zcd.yml
    - Chestcommand.open.zcd.yml
    - Easykits.kits.new
    - Easykits.kits.maxuse
    - EasyKits.kits.cooldown
    - essentials.jail.allow.seen
    - essentials.jail.allow.ping
    - essentials.jail.allow.mail
    - essentials.worth
    - essentials.warp.list
    - essentials.warp
    - essentials.tpdeny
    - essentials.tpahere
    - essentials.tpaccept
    - essentials.tpa
    - essentials.time
    - essentials.suicide
    - essentials.signs.break.trade
    - essentials.signs.break.protection
    - essentials.signs.break.mail
    - essentials.signs.break.disposal
    - essentials.signs.create.trade
    - essentials.signs.create.protection
    - essentials.signs.create.mail
    - essentials.signs.create.disposal
    - essentials.signs.use.*
    - essentials.sethome.multiple
    - essentials.sethome.bed
    - essentials.sethome
    - essentials.recipe
    - essentials.protect
    - essentials.powertooltoggle
    - essentials.powertool
    - essentials.ping
    - essentials.pay
    - essentials.msg.format
    - essentials.msg
    - essentials.me
    - essentials.mail.send
    - essentials.mail
    - essentials.kits.tools
    - essentials.kit
    - essentials.itemdb
    - essentials.ignore
    - essentials.home
    - essentials.getpos
    - essentials.exp
    - essentials.depth
    - essentials.delhome
    - essentials.compass
    - essentials.chat.question
    - essentials.chat.shout
    - essentials.chat.format
    - essentials.book
    - essentials.balancetop
    - essentials.balance.others
    - essentials.balance
    - essentials.back.ondeath
    - essentials.back
    - essentials.afk.auto
    - essentials.afk
    - essentials.build.*
    - modifyworld.*
    - essentials.jail.allow.rules
    - essentials.jail.allow.helpop
    - essentials.jail.allow.help
    - essentials.spawn
    - essentials.rules
    - essentials.motd
    - essentials.list
    - essentials.helpop
    - essentials.help
    - bukkit.command.plugins
    - bukkit.broadcast.user
    - -bukkit.command.plugins
    - essentials.chat.color
    - essentials.hat
    - essentials.msg.color
    - essentials.nick
    - essentials.seen

玩家也的确是default权限组！
可是上面给过的所有权限都不起作用！
玩家在服务器内没有权限！
求大佬告知怎么解决？

replies.author: Super_Miao
replies.txt_content:
配置明显就有问题

正常应该是
groups:
  default:
    options:
      default: true
    permissions:
    - xxx.xxx

Super_Miao 发表于 2017-10-14 21:29
配置明显就有问题

正常应该是
..................这样啊....好吧
